name: CloudCite
0:
”Alexa, open cloudcite”
”Alexa, start cloudcite”
”Alexa, launch cloudcite”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cloud cite
des:
CloudCite is a free, automatic, and ad-free bibliography generator for popular citation styles such as MLA 8th Edition, APA, and Chicago. CloudCite is now available for Alexa to help you answer questions about these citation styles while you are using our website.

Create a bibliography today at https://cloudcite.net.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
